The interaction polymer Platform vessel wall , effect everolimus neointima growth cellular response medium could reduce inflammatory process vulnerable plaque could different Under OMT BVS implantation .
DOC.criteria: STEMI multivessel ASCL Successful uneventful primary PCI Non culprit lesion > /= 2.5mm RVD suitable investigation FFR At least one segment minimum 10 mm length contain non culprit lesion non compliant profile patient able sign IC cardiogenic shock leave main disease GFR < 30ml/min/m2 previous CABG LVEF < 35 %
